name: Coin Analyzer
description: A web app that performs image recognition using a convolutional neural network. The CNN is implemented with the Pytorch library and training consisteted of preprocessing raw data and learning through stochastic gradient descent. 2025 team project.

0.alt: A screenshot of the coin analyzer. On the left is an image of a one cent U.S. coin. On the right is the program's prediction of the image being that of a one cent coin.

1.alt: A screenshot of the coin analyzer. On the left is an image of a five cent U.S. coin. On the right is the program's prediction of the image being that of a five cent coin.

2.alt: A screenshot of the coin analyzer. On the left is an image of a twenty-five cent U.S. coin. On the right is the program's prediction of the image being that of a twenty-five cent coin.
